content.prompt: Advocates for individuals such as those shown in the photograph most likely would have agreed with which of the following perspectives?

choices.label: That ensuring fair wages was primarily the responsibility of labor unions
That the government had an obligation to establish workplace safety standards
That the use of child labor was necessary to maintain competitiveness
That the government should not interfere with private business practices

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
